vaccinations.name: Hepatitis A
vaccinations.message: Vaccination is recommended for all travelers to this country

vaccinations.name: Hepatitis B
vaccinations.message: The vaccination advice is personal. Consult a qualified medical professional to determine whether vaccination is useful for you

vaccinations.name: Yellow fever
vaccinations.message: Yellow fever does not occur in this country. However, vaccination is required if you are traveling from a country with the risk of yellow fever

vaccinations.name: Tyfoid
vaccinations.message: The vaccination advice is personal. Consult a qualified medical professional to determine whether vaccination is useful for you

vaccinations.name: DTP
vaccinations.message: Vaccination is recommended for all travelers to this country

UA.advise: Exercise a high degree of caution

CA.advise: <!-- START adv-russia -->Avoid non-essential travel (with regional advisories)<!-- END adv-russia -->
